AOBRDLogBookViolations.description: Driver must reconstruct log if device fails
AOBRDLogBookViolations.recommendedAction: Use paper logs to reconstruct driving and on-duty time.

AOBRDLogBookViolations.description: Instruction sheet must be in cab
AOBRDLogBookViolations.recommendedAction: Carry AOBRD instructions with the unit.

AOBRDLogBookViolations.description: Supply of blank log sheets for trip
AOBRDLogBookViolations.recommendedAction: Keep at least 8 days of blank paper logs available.
